metadata.title: Most Accurate Prayer Times, Quran, Athan and Qibla Direction | IslamicFinder
metadata.description: Get the most accurate Prayer times, Qibla direction for more than 6 million places. Read Quran, Duas and check today’s date from Hijri Gregorian calendar. Find nearby Mosques. IslamicFinder shows the most accurate/authentic Sehar time and iftar time in the holy month of Ramadan.
